head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths JACKSON, EDITH M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths JACKSON, EDITH M.

block.p: JACKSON-Edith M. July 30, 2001 of Little Neck, NY. Retired teacher, JHS 67. Beloved wife of the late Ben E. Jackson. Devoted mother of Anthony. Cherished grandmother of four granddaughters. Graveside services/interment at Mt. Ararat Cemetery, Farmingdale, LI, NY, Tuesday 12 noon. Contributions may be made to American Cancer Society, 30 Speen St, Framingham, MA 01701.
